meanings.sent1: I expect the sun to rise every morning.
meanings.sent2: She expects her package to arrive tomorrow.
meanings.sent3: The cat expects treats whenever the doorbell rings.
meanings.sent4: He expects trouble around every corner.
meanings.sent5: The teacher expects students to be prepared for class.

meanings.definition: Look forward to the probable occurrence or appearance of.
meanings.sent1: The children expect to see Santa Claus on Christmas Eve.
meanings.sent2: We expect good weather for our picnic this weekend.
meanings.sent3: I expect a delicious meal at my favorite restaurant.
meanings.sent4: She expects a promotion after working hard all year.
meanings.sent5: They expect a fun and exciting vacation in the mountains.

meanings.sent1: I expect a call from my friend later today.
meanings.sent2: The team expects a tough match against their rivals.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel expects to find nuts hidden in the garden.
meanings.sent4: She expects to see a shooting star during the meteor shower.
meanings.sent5: He expects a full house at his concert next week.
